bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Selecting and Testing Jackets for Power, Instrumentation, and Control Cables
Redline
IEEE Guide for Selecting and Testing Jackets for Power, Instrumentation, and Control Cables - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 532-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std 532-1993) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Revision of IEEE Std 532-1993. This guide covers properties of commonly used jackets as well as selection and testing of jackets. It is written for those responsible for optimizing cable designs. The purpose is to present a reasonably complete picture of the role of jackets so that the subject can be approached in an orderly and organized manner. An effort has been made to avoid the highly technical language and theory commonly used by electrical engineers and chemists to discuss the more detailed application of jackets.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
